long_description: mortgage financing doesn't have to be difficult. i am a certified financial planner and have over 25 years of experience in the financial services industry. let's find out whether you'll be able to afford to buy it. in contrast, dealing with an independent mortgage professional, you will have access to products from over 200 lenders, including banks, monoline lenders, credit unions, finance companies, alternative lenders, institutional b lenders, mortgage investment corporations, and private funds. banks don't employ mortgage experts; they employ salespeople. banks pay and incentivize salespeople to sell their products. banks don't have your best interest in mind. however, when you work with an independent mortgage professional, you get the experience of someone who understands the intricacies of mortgage financing and will advocate on your behalf to get you the best mortgage. when you work with an independent mortgage professional, everyone wins. as such, banks will rarely offer you their best terms at the outset of your negotiation.
